title: Sennheiser SoundProtex hearing protection earplugs launched: Price, details - Business Standard
summary:
Sennheiser Launches SoundProtex Hearing Protection Earplugs

Last Updated: Jan 09 2025 | Source: Business Standard

The German audio brand Sennheiser has launched its SoundProtex hearing protection earplugs in India. These earplugs are designed to protect users from hearing damage in loud environments while still allowing them to hear necessary sounds.

  • The earplugs are priced at Rs 1,990 and will be available from January 10 on Sennheiser's webshop and Amazon India.
  • They feature patented membrane filter technology to ensure balanced sound without damaging hearing.
  • SoundProtex earplugs have two-stage filters for optimal sound quality, allowing speech to be heard clearly.
  • Reusable and can be cleaned with water, ensuring durability.
  • Available in three sizes of ear tips made of medical-grade TPE material for comfort and fit.
  • Includes a compact pouch for portability.
“The SoundProtex earplugs help in maintaining focus while working, studying, and meditating.” - Sennheiser

In conclusion, Sennheiser's SoundProtex earplugs offer a unique solution for individuals exposed to loud environments, combining hearing protection with sound quality.

summary:
Why Apple Could Replace iPhone 16 Plus with iPhone 17 Air

Publication Date: January 9, 2025   Source: India Today

Apple is reportedly planning a new ultra-thin iPhone model for its 2025 flagship lineup, likely called the iPhone 17 Air, aimed at replacing the iPhone Plus variant.

  • The iPhone 17 Air is rumored to offer a thinner, lighter design in line with Apple's portfolio, including the MacBook Air and iPad Air.
  • Expected launch is in September 2025, with production rumored to have started in December 2024.
  • It will feature a 6.6-inch OLED display, slightly smaller than the iPhone 16 Plus' 6.7-inch screen.
  • The new model may adopt a significantly thinner aluminum chassis, potentially measuring as little as 6mm in thickness.
  • It is rumored to come with a single 48MP rear camera, potentially omitting features found in higher-end models.
  • The iPhone 17 Air is likely to have an A19 chip, offering modest performance improvements over the A18 series.
  • Despite its minimalist design, it is expected to include 120Hz ProMotion technology.
  • Launch of the iPhone 17 Air has not been confirmed, with rumors also mentioning the iPhone SE 4 as a possible release.
"Despite its thin design, the iPhone 17 Air is expected to feature 120Hz ProMotion technology, which Apple is rumored to include in the entire iPhone 17 lineup."

In conclusion, the potential introduction of the iPhone 17 Air marks Apple's continued focus on sleek and lightweight devices, though confirmation is still pending.

title: Apple releases iOS 18.3 public beta 2: New features, eligibility details - Business Standard
summary:
Apple releases iOS 18.3 public beta 2: New features, eligibility details

Publication Date: [Not specified] Source: [Not specified]

Apple has rolled out the second public beta of its iOS 18.3 update, focusing on minor enhancements, bug fixes, and user interface improvements. Compared to the iOS 18.2 update, iOS 18.3 appears to be a minor update, introducing only a few new features.

iOS 18.3 public beta 2: What's new

  • The first public beta expanded support for smart home devices, adding compatibility for robot vacuum cleaners.
  • The second beta updates the Calculator app, reintroducing sequential calculations using the equals button.
  • This marks a reversal of the change made in iOS 18.

iOS 18.3 public beta 2: Eligibility

The beta is accessible to all iPhones enrolled in the iOS 18 beta program. However, new Apple Intelligence features are compatible only with the iPhone 15 Pro and the iPhone 16 series.

iOS 18.3 public beta 2: How to download and install

  1. Sign up for the public beta on Apple’s website.
  2. Go to Settings > General > Software Update.
  3. Tap on Beta Updates and select iOS 18 Public Beta.
  4. Return and wait for the download to appear.
  5. Agree to Apple’s terms and initiate the download process.
  6. Installation begins once the download is complete.
  7. Back up your iPhone before installing the beta.

This public beta allows users to test features ahead of the official release, keeping in mind the importance of backing up their devices.
newTitle: Apple releases iOS 18.3 public beta 2: New features, eligibility details

  • The 3-litre twin-turbo engine produces 473bhp and 530Nm of torque, with capabilities of 0 to 100 km/h in 3.3 seconds and a top speed of 308 km/h.
  • Expect pricing for the Carrera S to exceed ₹2 crore in India.
Porsche has fitted new turbochargers and has extensively optimised the charge-air cooling.

This unveiling marks an exciting addition to Porsche's 911 lineup, promising both performance and luxury for sports car enthusiasts.

Apple’s iOS 18.3 Public Beta 2 released: Calculator function restored, bug fixes and more | Mint - Mint
summary:
Apple’s iOS 18.3 Public Beta 2 released: Calculator function restored, bug fixes and more

Publication Date: March 2023

Source: Business Today

Cupertino-based Apple has reportedly released iOS 18.3 Public Beta 2, offering a glimpse at the upcoming software update.

According to a report, the latest beta introduces minor enhancements aimed at refining the user experience, including a key update to the Calculator app and several bug fixes.

  • Calculator Feature Restored: The beta restores a previously removed function, allowing users to repeat calculations by pressing the equals button.
  • Expanding Home App Functionality: Continued development for integrating compatible robot vacuums into the Home app.
  • Bug Fixes and Performance Enhancements: A focus on essential bug fixes and optimizations for a smoother user experience.
  • How to Access the Update: Existing public beta users can install it via Settings > Software Update; new users must enroll in the Beta Software Programme.
  • What Lies Ahead: iOS 18.3 is expected to be less feature-heavy, with more significant features anticipated in the upcoming iOS 18.4 release.

For those keen to explore the latest changes, iOS 18.3 Public Beta 2 provides a chance to test refinements ahead of the full release.
newTitle: Apple’s iOS 18.3 Public Beta 2 released: Calculator function restored, bug fixes and more
